translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

Having Colonel Joaquim José da Silva and the citizen Rolino Pereira de Barros, both residents of this Department, offered, the former by loan and the latter gratuitously, one hundred beef calves each, may Your Excellency Napoleone Castellini.

God keep Your Excellency  
Secretariat of the Treasury Affairs in Caçapava, March 23, 1839.  
Domingos José de Almeida  
Most Illustrious Sir Joaquim dos Santos Prado Lima, General Chief of Police of the Department and Frontier of Alegrete.

March — 23 — 39.  
Almeida.

Presidency Secretariat of the Republic  
Most Illustrious Sir Joaquim dos Santos Prado Lima,  
General Collector and Chief of Police of the Department and Frontier of Alegrete.  
Interim Inspector of the National Public Treasury.
